description:
Lightweight jacket or super-warm shirt? This wool shirt is a perfect example of why the shirt-jac became a cold-weather staple. Crafted from a soft wool blend and accented with Fjallraven’s signature G-1000 fabric, the Canada Shirt is the next evolution of the classic lumberjack plaid.

  • Acrylic wool and polyester blend is warm, thick and strong
  • Deep dual chest pockets with snap closures keep small necessities close
name: Fjallraven Canada Shirt Long Sleeve - Men's
